line.text: When I have seen by Time fell hand defaced
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The rich-proud cost of outworn buried age
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When sometime lofty towers I see down-rased
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And brass eternal slave to mortal rage
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When I have seen the hungry ocean gain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Advantage on the kingdom of the shore
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And the firm soil win of the watery main
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Increasing store with loss and loss with store
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When I have seen such interchange of State
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or state it self confounded to decay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Ruin hath taught me thus to ruminate
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That Time will come and take my love away
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: This thought is as a death which cannot choose
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But weep to have that which it fears to lose
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
